RT @SBECouncil Yes! The #smallbiz community stands with you Senator @marcorubio! Keep fighting for small business regulatory reform to help startups and mom and pop businesses compete and succeed! https://twitter.com/SmallBizCmte/status/1154073845437018113 QT @SmallBizCmte Federal agencies usually do not take into account the contradicting and overlapping regulations that have a profound effect on the livelihood of a small business.

That is why regulatory reform is a key part of the first Small Business Act reauthorization in nearly two decades. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1154073577098031104/pu/img/BwrbFbWL6JXRHBU6.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1154073577098031104/pu/vid/480x270/zXYxt2XWhaCbRYGb.mp4?tag=10

and more!

100 people die from gun violence every day in America. This is a public health crisis and there’s no reason for Congress to continue restricting gun violence research.

The House recently approved $50 million in research funding—it's time for the Senate to do its job.

When I was a senior in high school, my family didn’t have the money for college application fees—let alone a college education. Through a mix of scholarships and part-time jobs, I ended up getting my 4-year degree at a commuter college that cost $50 a semester. #TBT http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EAV4-MJWsAANw-p.jpg

RT @KatieHill4CA Republicans JUST blocked 2 election security bills — hours after Mueller said Russia is actively trying to sway the 2020 elections — showing in plain sight that they’re willing to dismantle our democracy & take help from our most dangerous adversary to win https://thehill.com/blogs/floor-action/senate/454635-gop-blocks-election-security-bills-after-mueller-testimony?amp&__twitter_impression=true

The War on Drugs disproportionately impacted communities of color. My new bill would ensure that as marijuana becomes legal, people negatively affected by marijuana criminalization have a real opportunity to participate in this growing industry.

*When you’re 7 months into your new job but that one guy still doesn’t know how to say your name* https://twitter.com/brespolitico/status/1154421008834736128 QT @BresPolitico .@GOPLeader keeps calling her @AOC “Congresswoman AOC.”

As president, I will give Congress 100 days to get their act together and pass reasonable gun safety laws. If they don’t, I will take executive action. Thoughts and prayers are not enough. We need action.

This decision is disturbing and does nothing to advance the cause of justice. The death penalty is not only ineffective and immoral, but also fraught with biases. 

We can, and should, do better. https://twitter.com/NPR/status/1154402547173646336 QT @NPR BREAKING: For the first time in nearly two decades, the federal government will resume executions.

Attorney General William Barr is directing the Bureau of Prisons to change protocols effectively clearing the way towards resuming capital punishment in the federal system.

Let's get real: Zinke is making big bucks to help oil companies influence the govt. That’s lobbying. My bill to #EndCorruptionNow would fix the Swiss cheese definition of lobbyist & put a lifetime lobbying ban on cabinet members so guys like Zinke can’t exploit our land OR govt.

lobbyist dude walks by and rants about how we can’t pay interns cause of the national debt

Our broken criminal justice system targets poor people and minorities disproportionately with the death penalty, including those who are innocent. The government should not be in the business of killing people. We're months away from the beginning of our next major elections. The time to protect our democracy is now. https://twitter.com/loopemma/status/1154463181185736706 QT @LoopEmma NEW: The Senate Intelligence Committee has just released the first volume of its bipartisan Russia investigation report. Under my plan, there’ll be no more problems with voter registration, no more arbitrary voter purges, and no more gerrymandering. RT @TheRealBuzz Returning from the moon was the ultimate homecoming. We had checklists to follow, but we knew where they led – home. Neil and Mike were great crew-mates, Neil a great commander. Nobody should be "drowning," worrying about becoming homeless, because of crushing student debt in the United States of America.

It is time to tax Wall Street to fund student debt cancellation and tuition-free public colleges for all. https://www.npr.org/2019/07/18/739451168/i-m-drowning-those-hit-hardest-by-student-loan-debt-never-finished-college

Woo-hoo! The House unanimously passed the PRIDE Act, which included my bill with @RepJudyChu & @RepAndyLevin to let legally married same-sex couples get the tax refunds they were denied. @senatemajldr should do what's right & give our bill a vote.  https://www.lgbtqnation.com/2019/07/house-unanimously-passed-bill-give-money-back-sex-couples/

No one should be saddled with a $300,000 bill because they had a child.

Under Medicare for All, there will be no copayments, deductibles or premiums. https://twitter.com/IrvanSteve/status/1154506518642872324?s=20 QT @IrvanSteve @BernieSanders I still have a $300,000 bill from when my son was born. My wife had medical coverage through the state but when he spent 21 days in the NICU they decided they weren't going to cover the caesarean section and the NICU visit leaving us with a bill theres no way we could pay...

The United States is the only major country in the world that makes sick people check to see if their hospital or doctor is "in-network" before getting care.

Under Medicare for All you will be able to see any doctor and go to any hospital you want. https://twitter.com/oneim030/status/1154513084360396801?s=20 QT @oneim030 @BernieSanders I have a $60,000 bill from a hospital for a 10 day stay in 2016.  My doctor was in my insurance network however the hospital he worked in was not.

Today, it’s a different story. An entire generation is being crippled by student debt and skyrocketing tuition costs. My plan to cancel debt for 95% of Americans with student loan debt, make public college free, and invest in HBCUs would end this crisis. https://medium.com/@teamwarren/im-calling-for-something-truly-transformational-universal-free-public-college-and-cancellation-of-a246cd0f910f

Sov and his wife Jessica received a bill for over $540K for dialysis care. That's more than the cost of a typical kidney transplant. How many more people need to risk bankruptcy before we fix our broken system? 
https://twitter.com/NPR/status/1153591605145812992 QT @NPR When Sovereign's kidneys failed, he needed dialysis. His wife repeatedly asked clinic staff and the insurer how much they could expect to be charged, but couldn't get an answer.

Then the bill came — for more than half a million dollars.
https://trib.al/MCureuj

The beauty of a Medicare for all system is its simplicity.

If your child is sick, you do not have to worry about out-of-network cost or copayments for them to see a pediatrician — they will get the care they need, free at the point of service. https://twitter.com/ERDLawNY/status/1154512314047041541 QT @ERDLawNY @BernieSanders Daughter goes to doctor for check up, without her knowledge or consent the dr sends her bloodwork to an out of network lab. She gets a bill for $2000! For bloodwork! Outrageous!

¡Que Viva Puerto Rico! 🇵🇷
